price: Sε Yεpε a anka Yεde onipa biara kwankyerε bεma no (anaasε anka yεbεkyerε onipa biara kwan), nanso asεm a efri Me hͻ no yε nokorε sε: “Mεka Jinn ne nnipa abom de wͻn ahyε Amanehunu gya no mma.
arabic: وَلَوۡ شِئۡنَا لَأٓتَيۡنَا كُلَّ نَفۡسٍ هُدَىٰهَا وَلَٰكِنۡ حَقَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ مِنِّي لَأَمۡلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaw shi'nā laātaynā kulla nafsin hudāhā walākin ḥaqqa al-qawlu minnī la-amla-anna jahannama mina al-jinati wal-nāsi ajmaʿīna
